Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item carries a unique value, tailored to exceed expectations and bring unparalleled benefits to its owner. Considering its remarkable features and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $18000. This opportunity allows you to secure this premium product at a competitive advantage. I believe this investment would significantly contribute to your goals and aspirations. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
